text: Reg Presley (12 June 1941 â€“ 4 February 2013) was a British singer-songwriter. He was born Reginald Maurice Ball in Andover, Hampshire, where he lived all his life. He was the lead singer of rock band The Troggs.Telegraph obituary In January 2012, Presley said he was retiring due to being diagnosed with lung cancer. Thirteen months later, he died at his house in Andover of lung cancer and strokes. == References == Category:1941 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Disease-related deaths in Hampshire Category:English rock musicians Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Musicians from Hampshire
title: Reg Presley
